~trác~ks ýó~ú ácr~óss {companyPrevalence}% ~óf tó~p sít~és.

trackersBlockedDesc.note: Returns a string in the form of 'We blocked CompanyA and CompanyB from trying to track you.'

cookiesMinimized.note: Title for when we have set the cookie privacy settings on this website to maximize privacy

trackerNetworksDesc.title: {blocked, select, true {{majorNetwork, select, true {{trackerCount, plural, one {[ONE: {trackerCount} M~ájór ~Trác~kér Ñ~étwó~rk Bl~ócké~d]} other {[OTHER: {trackerCount} M~ájó~r Trá~ckér ~Ñétw~órk~s Bló~ckéd]}}} other {{trackerCount, plural, one {[ONE: {trackerCount} T~ráck~ér Bl~ócké~d]} other {[OTHER: {trackerCount} T~rác~kérs ~Bló~ckéd]}}}}} other {{majorNetwork, select, true {{trackerCount, plural, one {[ONE: {trackerCount} M~ájó~r Trá~ckér ~Ñétw~órk F~óúñd]} other {[OTHER: {trackerCount} M~ájór ~Trác~kér Ñ~étwó~rks F~óúñd]}}} other {{trackerCount, plural, one {[ONE: {trackerCount} T~rác~kér F~óúñd]} other {[OTHER: {trackerCount} T~ráck~érs F~óúñd]}}}}}}

trackerCountForDomain.title: {blocked, select, true {{trackerCount, plural, one {[ONE: {trackerCount} T~rác~kér B~lóck~éd ó~ñ {domain}]} other {[OTHER: {trackerCount} T~rác~kérs ~Blóc~kéd ó~ñ {domain}]}}} other {{trackerCount, plural, one {[ONE: {trackerCount} T~ráck~ér Fó~úñd ó~ñ {domain}]} other {[OTHER: {trackerCount} T~ráck~érs F~óúñd ~óñ {domain}]}}}}
